constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 214 (Monday, December 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BACON:
H.R. 6246.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 provides Congress the authority to
``make rules for the government and regulation of the land
and naval forces''
[Page H7643]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: Defense Language Continuing Education Act of 2021
